name: Lemon Pending
description:
Help The Lemon God to sell lemonades!

This is a game made for the Sim Jam.

You are Lemon God's prisoner and responsible to help him selling lemonades! 

Controlls:

-AWSD or Arrow Keys to Move

-Left mouse click to click

Sorry if this game is still super bad, probably because this is my very first simulation game and made in a very short time :)

-A game by NicDev

-A game made for the Sim Jam

-Music by Evan King

Theme related:

The sim jam's theme is "A Matter Of Degree". In this game's scenario, the meaning of degree is money! Because the more money you have, the more things you can do such as buy new items, and make your lemonade shop succesfull!

A Devlog video and an android version will hopefully avalable soon! And don't forget to check my other games avalable on my itch.io page, GameJolt, and Kartrige!

I challenge you to defeat hard mode to unlock something special...
